Reviews.Title: “Linvig as an insider”
Reviews.Author: dusk1991
Reviews.Content: feel inside city apartment solution nova february freezing outside delighted wine tv fab extremely comfy bathroom loved laying hot water bath breakfast morning kissed sun pleasure admit hardest bedit comfortable bed slept dreaming mattress awesome patiobalcony magnificent daily cleaning night found immaculate people extremely wine glass staff wasnt angry worried glasses moreover called reception saturday reserve car morning 5am pick airport enjoy stay adam thanks wonderful friend dutch kindness city nova thank italy hope november

Reviews.Title: “not organisied”
Reviews.Author: MidlandsJonney
Reviews.Content: stayed night arrived check inn 2pm door tip apartment robbed distressing partner contacted reception via phone told understaffed cleaners finally checked 530pm ruined hoilday offered night free receptionist kept telling lies check inn time staying aprtment money nice clean location buzzing constanly free concert happening awesome

Reviews.Title: “Better than an hotel”
Reviews.Author: Geert-Hilde
Reviews.Content: month payed 150 euro 2 hotel 140 euro spacious clean apartment compared 4 suite hotel course dont service front desk keys waiting envelop hall thats apartment cleaned daily towels refreshed kitchen bathroom equipped tvs safe iron coffee set free coffee pads combined oven dishwasher fridge freezer remark families children door bedroom living

Reviews.Title: “Good location,clean & comfortable”
Reviews.Author: StephenLewis
Reviews.Content: found studio clean comfortable equipped location major museums concertgebouw tram connections rest city whilst quiet treelined street cleaning carried standard daily free wifi time liked thicker curtains light street lamp price opinion amsterdam pity id visit accommodation expensive
